title: Tilted 180
body: I just got off a 4 loose streak and went from 88 LP to 16 LP and i feel like crying im so sad....idk why i just went from a 5 win streak to a 4 loose streak and its just soooo tedious for me any advice would be helpful

replies.body:
Definitely take a break from ranked. The more you play and lose, the more frustrated you get, then the cycle continues. 

Check out this video series for the [science behind tilt](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iBj8YyfNmWU) and [how to combat it.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_c0f2_UJALQ)

Good luck ♥
